item.title: Guests at Emaar can customize their experience using the latest apps
item.description: Source: Emaar. Emaar introduces custom-designed apps, linked with their internal systems, to improve the customer experience. • Apps for Address Hotels + Resorts, Vida Hotels and Resorts, Palace Downtown, and Manzil Downtown are now available. These apps are personalized based on guest profiles and preferences. The Rove Hotels App will be launched soon. • The apps connect with backend systems, providing management teams with important real-time data to improve the guest experience.

item.title: The highlight of the Downtown Dubai New Year's Eve Gala is the Burj Khalifa
item.description: To celebrate the arrival of 2015, Dubai’s Burj Khalifa will showcase a dazzling LED display across its 828-meter height, synchronized with a spectacular fireworks show, according to a report from the Emirates News Agency, WAM. Emaar Properties, the developer behind Downtown Dubai, is orchestrating a six-part extravaganza for their New Year’s Eve Gala. The event will feature a captivating blend of fireworks, laser displays, and a light show. A highlight of the celebration will be a special tribute to Dubai, its leaders, and the UAE’s accomplishments over the past 43 years, projected onto the specially designed LED screen.
